alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 24 at 6:51PM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Along Rapid Creek from near the Fairgrounds in Rapid City all the way downstream to the Cheyenne River. * WHEN...Until 645 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of Rapid Creek as well as other low-lying and flood-prone locations along Rapid Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 641 PM MDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen, with additional rainfall of up to an inch possible tonight. - Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Eastern Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Farmingdale and Caputa.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
